mention.text: bogota , 10 oct 89 -- `` the extraditables , '' the armed branch of the medellin cartel have claimed responsibility for the murder of two employees of bogota 's daily el espectador
`` the extraditables , '' the armed branch of the medellin cartel have claimed responsibility for the murder of two employees of bogota 's daily el espectador
the medellin cartel have claimed responsibility for the murder of two employees of bogota 's daily el espectador
martha luz lopez , 35 , who worked for el espectador 11 years
el espectador 's office in medellin , threatening to kill all the editors and office personnel who do not resign in 3 days
orozco de lopez , who was wounded
soler , who was in charge of advertising and circulation of el espectador in medellin and the northwestern area of colombia
soler , who was 45-years old and had worked for 25 years at el espectator
